name: Diplomacy
effect:
:expert:

:instant: Skip Combat with [Neutral Units](../units/index.md) on a field whose Field Difficulty is equal to your Hero's level. Visit the field. This Hero gains no Experience.
expert_effect: :instant: Skip Combat with [Neutral Units](../units/index.md) on a field whose Field Difficulty is equal to your Hero's level. Visit the field. This Hero gains no Experience.
